title: Sawmill's escape
acceptText: Hello, I am Sawmill! I live in this rocket because of reasons. That is why it is called ''Sawmill Express''. But I have a problem, I can not start the rocket because I fucked up the start button. It is on the outside... Can you help me press the button? It only works if you first kill five zombies AND build a sandcastle. You're a wizard, Legolas! Now go!
